section: 4.2 Limited Role of Constraints and Diminishing Influence of Questions

caption: Table A.1: The distribution of attribution scores for constraint descriptions relative to the actions in the final plan in Llama3.1-70B on TravelPlanner.
description: Table A.1 shows the attribution scores for constraint tokens on TravelPlanner, indicating minimal contribution of item attributes to the final plan, suggesting why agents struggle to follow constraints.
